abstract: Massey Energy’s board has agreed to begin exploring a potential sale after having received takeover interest from several companies, the coal producer said.
snippet: Massey Energy’s board has agreed to begin exploring a potential sale after having received takeover interest from several companies, the coal producer said.
lead_paragraph: 6:05 p.m. | Updated Massey confirmed in a statement on Monday that it was conducting a review of strategic alternatives.

headline.main: Massey Energy Board to Explore Potential Sale

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
